resources.string:
Welcome to Countries of the World, the application guide for countries and continents around the world. 

Learn about the countries of the world: capitals, populations, languages, areas, flags and more. 

Sources of information: 
GeoNames - http://www.geonames.org 
Wikipedia - http://en.wikipedia.org 
Vector World Map - http://www.vectorworldmap.com
Please contact the author via e-mail: \nsolaris.bed@gmail.com
